p: In this study, we report significantly enhanced PLQE of sky-blue-emission polycrystalline perovskite films from 1.1% to 49.7% by incorporating PEACl and YCl 3 into three-dimensional (3D) CsPbBr 3 perovskite films, where PEACl is phenylethylammonium chloride (C 6H 5C 2H 4NH 3Cl) and YCl 3 is Yttrium (III) chloride. The sky-blue PeLEDs with 2% YCl 3 showed high EQE of 11.0% and maximum brightness of 9040 cd m −2. Blue PeLED with 4.8% EQE was obtained by adding 10% YCl 3 in the perovskite film, with a device Commission Internationale de l’Eclairage (CIE) coordinate of (0.10, 0.13).
